data: Contraindications:  - Hypersensitivity to iodinated oral contrast  - Severe oliguria or anuria  - Sensitivity to iodine is not an absolute contraindication but should be discussed with a Radiologist  - consider using Readicat for known or probable aspiration  - Pediatric patients
